ticker: Thanks for dropping by, but the station is closed for the Easter holiday and to give our staff a break!
Swing by next week when we'll be back!
Join our VRChat group or visit us on Bluesky for news on our next events.
All camera drones must be secured on a leash or they may be captured and fed to our tame protogens

performers.name: Wolfintank
ticker: Follow Juicy on twitch.tv/wolfintank and Bluesky @wolfintank.bsky.social

performers.name: MeOwOgai
ticker: Board now for our final DJ of the evening!
Follow MeOwOgai at @meowogai.bsky.social on Bluesky and mixcloud.com/MeOwOgai

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: See you next week for more music!
So many jelly beans, so little time to shove them all up your nose.
